home_what_i_do: I make dynamic and responsive websites and applications
about_desc: Hello there, my name is Siva Kumar Gopi and I love doing stuff that impacts billions of people around the world. My love for development started at the age of 19 when I built a line following robot and used C++ to program it. Now, I mainly develop responsive applications using Java, React, NodeJs etc...
experience_0_overview: As a key member of the Research & Development team, I design, develop, and deploy modern payment solutions that directly impact business growth. My work includes building full-stack applications, leading critical feature development, optimizing performance, maintaining Kubernetes clusters, and integrating AI-driven tools and projects like the “AI Video Bill” to push product innovation forward.
experience_1_overview: At IDENTOS, I engineered secure data-sharing solutions using UMA 2.0 standards and contributed end-to-end to a product subdivision from design to delivery. I built RESTful APIs, responsive front-end interfaces, and used Docker to streamline local development and microservices deployment, delivering robust, scalable solutions in a fast-paced environment.
experience_2_overview: At Capgemini, I focused on enhancing enterprise application performance and security. I developed RESTful APIs, implemented Spring Security for robust access control, applied core design patterns for clean code architecture, and ensured production readiness through proactive defect resolution and meticulous documentation.
